name: tm20
effect: Teaches Safeguard to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Safeguard to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Endure Gen I: Rage)

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user creates a protective field that prevents status conditions for five turns.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user creates a protective field that prevents status conditions for five turns.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark thoughts. This may also make the target flinch.
